page.text: Les Vitrines de Vence QUICKGUIDE TO VENCE Real Estate Agents QU CKGUIDE I

Introduction More than 40% of Vence residents are expat’s who decided to live here after visiting as tourists. If you too have fallen in love with our beautiful town the following Real Estate Agents will help you to find your dream home ! This link icon will take you to individual websites for each establishment. To download the newest version of our Magazine click on this icon. All types of real estate transactions. Buying - sales - rentals - management. Specialized in the region of Vence, Tourrettes sur Loup, Saint Paul de Vence. Personalized advice. 26, Avenue de la Résistance - 06140 Vence Téléphone:+33(0)493586911•0681553481 E-Mail: info@masdazur.com www.masdazur.com Mas d’Azur

La Canopée Immobilier 29, Place du Grand jardin - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 19 24 Fax:0493599149 E-Mail: info@agencelacanopee.com www.agencelacanopee.com La Canopée Immobilier, une agence chaleureuse et dynamique, votre propose ses services en transaction vente et location ainsi qu’en gestion locative avec assurance des loyers impayés. Nous serons ravies de vous accueillir autour d’un petit café pour discuter de votre projet d’investissement.
Les Maisons de Béatrice 16, Avenue Henri Isnard - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)4 93 58 95 07 • Fax 04 93 598 59 06 E-Mail: info@maisonsbeatrice.com www.maisonsbeatrice.com
Renauld Immobilier 18 Bis, Av Marcellin Maurel - 06140 Vence Téléphone: +33 (0)6 13 16 38 06 E-Mail: immobilier.renauld@orange.fr www.renauld-immobilier.com

All about the icons Shopping No matter what type of gift or Provençale souvenir you would like to buy, you will find it in a shop here. FASHION SOUVENIRS DELICATESSEN Hotels and Other Accomodation If you are searching for superior comfort or a budget “bed and breakfast” you will find an accomodation to suit you here. Restaurants HOTELS GUEST HOUSES CAMPING Vence’s restaurants cater for every taste and pocket - from inexpensive “plat du jour” of local produce to exotic flavours from other lands or gourmet adventures. Cafes Vence’s many cafes are ideal places to relax and watch the world go by, to meet and chat to residents or other tourists, or plan your next excursion. Real Estate Agents See how real people live on the Côte d’Azur by visiting sales properties with a choice of Real Estate Agents. Perhaps your visit will prove a good financial investment. Services Banks, pharmacies, and if you can’t find what you’re looking for, it is probably listed here. Galleries SERVICES FINANCE TAKE-AWAY The “City of Arts” is home to many galleries. Each has its own theme, special artist or style of work. Some are hidden in interesting untravelled corners of the city. Beauty Whether tempted to try a new look or merely smartening up for a special evening out, Vence’s beauty parlours and hairdressers are at your service. Places Museums, Parks, Miscellaneous sites worth seeing...
